title: The Truth Cascade
outcome: Nikola leaks sealed reports about Halden’s death, proving the Council lied. Citizen-journalists reconstruct Halden’s last days. Mass protests erupt, demanding the Council step down. The truth of Halden’s intended system collapse is made public, shaking all factions and leading to spontaneous city assemblies.

events.description: Nikola quietly releases sealed medical and system log files about Halden’s death to several trusted citizen groups. The reports spread rapidly and explode on social media platforms.
Amateur researchers and citizen-journalists confirm Halden died during a deliberate attempt to destabilize the BCI, exposing the Council’s deception about cause and intent.
Protests erupt across Stenograd, calling for the resignation of the entire Council. Oksana and Nikola become focal points of public debate, responding to accusations and appeals for new elections.
Makeshift city assemblies gather in major districts. Historic secrets and misdeeds are aired, and citizens demand collective decision-making on the fate of the system and Council.
